verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Donald's gone up the hill, hard and hungry Donald's come down the hill wild an' angry Donald will clear, the gauks nest cleverly Here's tae the King an' to Donald MacGillavray

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Come like a weighbauk, Donald MacGillavray Come like a weighbauk, Donald MacGillavray Balance them fair, and balance them cleverly Give them full measure my Donald MacGillavray

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Donalds run over the hill, but his tether man As he were wud, on stang'd wi' either man When he comes back there's some will look merrily Here's tae King James and to Donald MacGillavray

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Come like a weaver, Donald MacGillavray Come like a weaver, Donald MacGillavray Pack on your back, and illwand so cleverly Give them full measure, my Donald MacGillavray

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Donald has gotten wi' reif an' roguery Donald has dinnered wi' banes an' beggary Better it were for Whigs, an' Wiggery Meetin' the Devil, an' Donald MacGillavray

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: Come like a tailor, Donald MacGillavray Come like a tailor, Donald MacGillavray Push about, an' in and out, and thimble them cleverly Here's tae' King James an' tae' Donald MacGillavray

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Donalds the callin' that brooks no tangledness Whiggin, an priggin' an all newfangledness They might be gone, he will not be baukit man He might have justice, or faith he'll take it, man

verse.name: c4
verse.lines: Come like a cobbler, Donald MacGillavray Come like a cobbler, Donald MacGillavray Beat them, and bore them, and lingle them cleverly Up wi' King James, an' with Donald MacGillavray

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Donald was mumpit wi mirds, an' mockery Donald was blinded wi' blads of property Arles ran high but makin' were nothin, man Lord how Donald is flightin' an' frettin', man

verse.name: c5
verse.lines: Come like the Devil, Donald MacGillavray Come like the Devil, Donald MacGillavray Skelp them an' skaud them, what proved so unbrotherly Up wi' King James, an' with Donald MacGillavray
